metadata.name: delete2_swf_5
metadata.description: Tests DELETE2 opcode (0x3B) - deletes named properties from scope

notes: DELETE2 is implemented but test needs updating. Current test was designed for DELETE (0x3A) behavior (object + property on stack). DELETE2 (0x3B) only pops property name and searches scope chain. Test should be updated to use property paths like 'obj.y' or WITH scopes.
